nodes.title: Fix incorrectly-typed comparisons in biome dictionary
Some fixes for extracted dependencies
Clean up Reader/Writer handling to use a specified charset

Fix dragon fight not initialising correctly under some circumstances

Preserve original position for decoration events.
Fixes parameter inconsistency in IFieldWrapper (Fixes #4325)

Elytra Update

Reimplement IItemRenderer

Place Event (Implements #5054)
